Welcome!

Welcome to my new blog!  Finally got around to setup the blog on my site.  Currently, I am using Community Server (a build between beta3 and the yet to be released RC1).  I've also configured it to work in a single blog configuration, as opposed to its default multiple blog configuration.  I've also got the gallery configured in the same manner.

Soon, I'll be posting an article with some instructions on how to configure Community Server this way.

Saturday, January 22, 2005

How To: Single Blog/Gallery Site Configuration →

About

This is the personal blog of Ken Robertson. I'm a developer at Involver working in Ruby/Rails. In a former life, I worked in .NET for many years and since moved on.

In my spare time, I like to build things. I like to experiment with different technologies to find how they best fit onto my utility belt.

I sometimes blog. You'll find those things here.

I sometimes code. You'll find those on Github.
